body:
I see this:

```
$ spack reindex
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/eschnett/src/spack/bin/spack", line 179, in <module>
    main()
  File "/Users/eschnett/src/spack/bin/spack", line 157, in main
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/Users/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/reindex.py", line 31, in reindex
    spack.installed_db.reindex(spack.install_layout)
  File "/Users/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py", line 316, in reindex
    for spec in directory_layout.all_specs():
  File "/Users/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/directory_layout.py", line 301, in all_specs
    return [self.read_spec(s) for s in spec_files]
  File "/Users/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/directory_layout.py", line 227, in read_spec
    spec = Spec.from_yaml(f)
  File "/Users/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1021, in from_yaml
    node[name]['dependencies'].items():
ValueError: too many values to unpack
```
title: `spack reindex` broke
